mapper.insert: insert into user_list ( user_id, id, pw, name, birth_date, nickname, address1, address2, phone_num, email, join_date) values ( user_list_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{psw}, #{name}, #{birth_date}, #{nickName}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{phoneNum}, #{mail}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from user_list where id = #{id}
select count(*) as count from user_list where id = #{id} and pw = #{psw}
select user_id, id, pw as psw, name, birth_date, nickname, address1, address2, phone_num as phoneNum, email as mail, join_date from user_list where id = #{id} and pw = #{psw}
select user_id, id, pw as psw, name, birth_date, nickname, address1, address2, phone_num as phoneNum, email as mail, join_date from user_list where user_id = #{user_id}
